channels.name: Jesse Alton
channels.description: Active channel featuring AI development, product strategy, and technology insights.

channels.name: Metaverse Interop Show
channels.description: Archive of the Metaverse Interop Show - video format episodes featuring interviews and discussions on metaverse interoperability. This show is now archived/closed.

videos.title: Building AI Agents with MCP
videos.description: Deep dive into building AI agents using Model Context Protocol for enterprise applications.

videos.title: Magick ML: No-Code AI Development
videos.description: Introduction to Magick ML's visual node-graph interface for building AI applications without code.

videos.title: AI Strategy for Founders
videos.description: How founders can leverage AI to build competitive advantages and scale faster.

videos.title: The Future of AI Agents
videos.description: Predictions and insights on where AI agents are heading in 2025 and beyond.

videos.title: OMI Group: Building Open Metaverse Standards
videos.description: Discussion with OMI Group members about creating interoperable metaverse standards.

videos.title: The State of Metaverse Interoperability
videos.description: Overview of current progress and challenges in metaverse interoperability.

videos.title: Avatar Interoperability Standards
videos.description: Technical deep dive into avatar portability across virtual worlds.

videos.title: Web3 and the Open Metaverse
videos.description: Exploring the intersection of Web3 technologies and open metaverse development.

videos.title: Building for the Spatial Web
videos.description: Practical guidance on developing applications for spatial computing platforms.

videos.title: Metaverse Interop Show: Episode 1
videos.description: Inaugural episode introducing the show and its mission to promote open standards.
